record.title: ORDER OF PROCEDURE

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on the FDA legislation, it is my understanding there will be three votes, and then final passage.
Mr. President, the votes occur all at one time?

record.chair: There is 2 minutes between each vote.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that be the case, and I also ask consent that there be 10-minute votes after the first vote.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered as to each request.
